All Classes

Class Description
Course
Represents a course provided by the school for students to enrol in.
DataContainer
A data container class that holds three arraylists for Staff, Student and Course objects.
Email
The Email class that handles the sending of notifications via email.
FileManager
This class is in charge of serializing and deserializing the DataContainer object.
Gender
Gender enumeration Contains all the valid gender options
Index
Represents an index belonging to a single course.
LessonType
LessonType enumeration Contains all the valid lesson types
LoginController
A controller that handles the login operations of this application.
NotificationInterface
The Notification Interface that defines the methods for each Notification medium class that implements this interface.
School
School enumeration Contains all the valid schools.
Staff
Abstract class that represents a Staff account in the STARSPlanner system.
StaffController
Staff Controller: Control of staff processes in STARSPlanner
STARSPlanner
The Boundary class that interacts with the user.
STARSPlannerApp
The STARSPlannerApp class that holds the main method.
Student
Abstract class that represents a Student account in the STARSPlanner system.
StudentController
Controller to contain all the business logic for student-related functions.
TimeSlot
Represents the time and location of a lesson.
User
Abstract class that represents a User account in the STARSPlanner system.
